group.name: Configuration
group.toolTip: Properties that cannot be modified using the client console.

attribute.name: Uploads Path
attribute.headerText: Set this attribute to the fully qualified path to the Uploads directory when it has been moved out of the web sites Root folder. When using this attribute you must manually add an Uploads virtual directory to the web site's IIS entry, and it should have the application removed like PrivateLabeling. The file permissions on the Uploads directory must also be checked after the directory has been moved. Running Development > Utilities > Clean Up on the site may help initialize the file permissions.

attribute.name: Backup Exclusions
attribute.headerText: Select the items to be excluded from backups generated by Centralpoint. All selected items must be backed up manually on the server.
